message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product at a price of $14,000. I think this is a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $12,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
